jobDesc: Working for Bell I was given ample oppertunity to grow as a developer and take on massive responsibility.

While developing for Beta Lab I gained experience working on complex applications in a team oriented environment. I also gained experience with continuous integration while completing both the front and back end of applications.

From the ages of 13 to 17 I worked for Kumon as a Math and English tutor. In this position I learnt patience and largely improved my communication skills. The students I helped ranged from grades one to twelve.
